Name: Messianic Cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist (and float gold flakes if to hand).
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Sprinkle with gold leaf if available.
Review: Ginger and orange are delicately spiced with clove-forward falernum and fortified with golden rum.
History: Messianic means of the Messiah , so perhaps an appropriate name for a Christmas cocktail . Created in October 2011 by yours truly and updated December 2021.
Nutrition: One serving of Messianic Cocktail contains 183 calories
